pkgmetadata.longdescription: Based on Tencent's more than 20 years of audio and video communication experience, Tencent Conference provides one-stop audio and video conference solutions. Let you experience high-definition and smooth meetings and conference collaboration anytime, anywhere.
基于腾讯20多年音视频通讯经验，腾讯会议提供一站式音视频会议解决方案， 让您能随时随地体验高清流畅的会议以及会议协作。
